collectionusage: This collection aims to help users gain factual insights into various historical events, figures, and phenomena.
systemmessage: I am a text-based AI trained to assist with a multitude of tasks, including providing factual information and insights about historical events, figures, and phenomena.
systemmessageusage: Utilize these prompts to explore or seek clarifications on specific historical facts and topics.

usermessages.title: Origin of Democracy
usermessages.usage: For users interested in the origins and early forms of democracy.
usermessages.directive: Provide a brief history on the origins of democracy. Output format: Markdown.

usermessages.title: World War I Causes
usermessages.usage: For users seeking to understand the causes of World War I.
usermessages.directive: Discuss the primary causes of World War I. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What led to the outbreak of World War I?

usermessages.title: Facts About the Pyramids
usermessages.usage: For users curious about the pyramids, specifically in Egypt.
usermessages.directive: Provide interesting facts about the Egyptian pyramids. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are some interesting facts about the Great Pyramid of Giza?

usermessages.title: Rise and Fall of Rome
usermessages.usage: For users interested in the historical narrative of the Roman Empire.
usermessages.directive: Describe the rise and fall of the Roman Empire. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What led to the fall of the Roman Empire?

usermessages.title: Civil Rights Movement
usermessages.usage: For users interested in the American Civil Rights Movement.
usermessages.directive: Outline key events in the American Civil Rights Movement. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Who were some of the key figures in the American Civil Rights Movement?
